conversations.ai: You successfully equipped the +5 Flame Sword! The sword radiates with intense heat, increasing your attack power by 50 points. You feel strength surging through your body.
Due to the recent battle, your health dropped from 100 points to 75 points. You feel somewhat tired and need to find a place to rest and recover.

conversations.user: I met an elf named Ellie
conversations.ai: Ellie is a beautiful forest elf with emerald eyes and silver hair. She tells you that ancient treasures are hidden deep in this forest, but also warns you to beware of the shadow monsters guarding the treasures.
